about_the_game:
Hello,
Here a little demo of my game Hohenheim: Skywards. A jump and run game with procedurally generated level.
Until the main game is ready please enjoy this demo and feel free to contact me when you find bugs or have any ideas how to improve gameplay.

until than please jump thru the clouds and soar in the sky.
